alert.note: Alert for Laurens (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued January 09 at 4:28PM EST until January 09 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Laurens County in upstate South Carolina... * Until 700 PM EST. * At 428 PM EST, The Little River gage in Laurens continued to rise, and flooding along the Little River is expected to worsen through early evening as runoff continues to work south into and through Laurens County. Flooding of low-lying areas near the Enoree, Lower Reedy, Rabon Creeks, and the Saluda will remain a threat as well. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
